column4: My computer is stuck on Grub Rescue. Can somebody help me? RIght now I'm booting off the Ubuntu live CD
this happened after I ran Ubuntu update last night

yeah no matter what the reason is...your GRUB2 is corrupted. So, you need to fix it. read point no.2 from that link or better read this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Grub2#Reinstalling%20from%20LiveCD
